original_title: Hacer una diagonal con la musica
overview: A short film about the Argentine electroacoustic composer Beatriz Ferreyra, an original pioneer of early musique concrète alongside Pierre Schaeffer during the ‘50s and ‘60s. Here she discusses her ‘sound hunting’ recording techniques, and other thoughts on sound montage and spatialization. Featuring creaking doors, barking dogs and rainbow hands.  Official Selection International Film Festival Rotterdam (IFFR) 2020
title: Making a Diagonal With Music
